authors.name: JinYoung Park
authors.affiliation: Oklahoma Medical Research Foundation; University of Oklahoma Health Sciences Center

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6qj9o","text":"This protocol is for the double-fixation of chromatin regulators for chromatin precipitation. The double-fixation method can improve signal-to-noise ratios of chromatin regulator ChIPs, especially for transiently bound proteins or those found in large protein complexes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Any action you take or refrain from taking using or relying upon the information presented here is strictly at your own risk. You agree that neither the Company nor any of the authors, contributors, administrators, or anyone else associated with protocols.io, can be held responsible for your use of the information contained in or linked to this protocol or any of our Sites/Apps and Services.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":160,"length":12},{"key":1,"offset":631,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"http://protocols.io"}}}}
materials_text:
{"blocks":[{"key":"drrmo","text":"Disuccinimidyl glutarate (DSG) [ChemCruz]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7q63a","text":"
DMSO [Sigma] ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h340","text":"
PBS [Fisher Scientific]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e3j1i","text":"
2.5M Glycine Solution:  Dissolve 93.84g Glycine (MW: 75.07g/mol) in 400ml sterile water. Adjust final volume to 500 ml and sterile filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bglnb","text":"
CiA Fix Buffer:  25 ml 1M HEPES pH 8.0; 1 ml 0.5M EDTA; 0.5 ml 0.5M EGTA; 10 ml 5M NaCl Adjust final volume to 500 ml with sterile water and filter sterilize","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8q6be","text":"
trypsin-EDTA 0.25% (Fisher Scientific)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cc86","text":"
16% Formaldehyde Solution (w/v) Methanol-Free [Thermo Scientific]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ftg62","text":"Place DSG at room temperature for approximately 30 minutes before weighing it out. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cb7bg","text":"Harvest the cells by first washing with PBS\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"nptv","text":"Incubate cells in trypsin-EDTA 0.25% until dissociated\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4jqd","text":"Quench trypsin with media + FBS and move cells to a 15ml conical. Spin down at 300g for 4 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8tl7f","text":"Resuspend cells in PBS and count","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6or8u","text":"Move 30e6 cells to a new tube and bring the volume up to 10mls with PBS and spin down at 300g for 4 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d7si6","text":"Resuspend cells in 10mls fresh PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ft6oa","text":"Add 80 ul DSG stock to each sample in 10 ml of PBS and incubate for 30 minutes at room temperature with rocking. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lqb4","text":"Note: After incubation with DSG, cells may adhere to the walls of pipette tips, so following\nthis incubation, it is recommended that tips be coated with 1% BSA/PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a1kcr","text":"Pellet samples by spinning at 1500 x g for 10 minutes at 4C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"310j3","text":"Carefully aspirate the supernatant, taking care not to disturb the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"46gbd","text":"Resuspend each sample in 10 ml of CiA Fix Buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4falh","text":"Add 667 ul of 16% Formaldehyde to the sample dropwise and incubate for exactly 10 minutes at room temperature using rotation\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c2c1t","text":"Stop cross-linking by adding 555 ul of 2.5M glycine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7r0sv","text":"Incubate samples on ice for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"95umq","text":"Pellet samples by spinning at 1500 x g for 10 minutes at 4°C\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c5p7b","text":"Aspirate supernatant taking care not to disturb the pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ssks","text":"Wash fixed cells with 10ml PBS\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ehou","text":"Pellet samples by spinning at 1000 x g for 5 minutes at 4C and aspirate supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9uuaq","text":"Samples can be stored at -80°C (snap freeze) or can begin processing for chromatin immunoprecipitation\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Double-fixation prior to ChIPs
